short_summary: Temporary Help Services for 1 Special Advisor
description: The contract requirement is for the provision of one (1) Special Advisor services. This requirement is open only to those supply arrangement holders under EN578-172870 who qualified under the following streams and categories: 13.9 Special Advisor.
full_summary:
#### **Government Tender Announcement: Request for Proposal for Temporary Help Services**

Published on: **2023-09-25 (Date de publication)**
Tender Closing Date: **2023-10-03 (Tender Closing Date)**
Amendment Number: **5 (Amendment number)**

**Project Overview:**

The Department of National Defence (DND) requires Temporary Help Services (THS) under the Supply Arrangement for the National Capital Region (NCR).

**Key Details:**

* **unspsc: 80111600 (Temporaired personnel services)**
* **procurement Category:** SRV (Service)
* **Trade Agreements:** Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP) and Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Regions of Opportunity:** National Capital Region (NCR)

**Bidders Invited:**

The following 14 shortlisted suppliers will be invited to submit a proposal:

1. 8513929 Canada Inc.
2. ADRM Technology Consulting Group Corp.
3. Confluence Consulting Inc.
4. Eagle Professional Resources Inc.
5. GCSTRATEGIES INCORPORATED
6. Humaxis Transformation Consulting, Inc.
7. MAKWA Resourcing Inc.
8. Makwa Resourcing Inc. (in joint venture with Koroc Consulting Inc.)
9. Nisha Technologies Inc.
10. PRECISIONERP INCORPORATED
11. TECH4SOFT INC. (in joint venture with Expertise Technology Consulting Inc.)
12. TEKSYSTEMS CANADA CORP./SOCIÉTÉ TEKSYSTEMS CANADA
13. The Halifax Computer Consulting Group Inc.
14. Thinkpoint Inc.
15. Veritaaq Technology House Inc.

**Notice and Attachments:**

Notice can be viewed [here](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/11987/s4648123---method-2---rfp-%28english-version.pdf) (multiple PDF formats available).

Contracting Entity (Government Agency):

* **Department of National Defence**
* **Address:** 60 Moodie Drive, Ottawa, ON K2H 8G1, Canada

End Date for Submissions:
The tender is available online and will be closed on **2023-10-03**. Suppliers must submit a proposal in response to the vendor-specific Master Service Agreement (MSA). Suppliers must have been pre-qualified under the Supply Arrangement (SA) before the submission
